item.description:
The Amazing System That Compels Members Of The Opposite Sex to Approach You
First For a Date No Matter Your Looks, Age, Race or Income.

Plus Where to Meet Them, What to Say, and How to Never Be Rejected Ever Again...

Sick of having to face rejection, not knowing exactly what to say?

Dating can be very difficult and stressful and its not your fault.  I stumbled on a simple system that I am going to teach you that compels strangers to want to meet you so you have to do almost no work to get fantastic dates.

Imagine being the center of attention where you don't have to approach strangers.  The person you want approaches you. You will surprise yourself with how easy and effortless it is to strike up conversations with total strangers and get to know them once they approach you. Once you have this skill, you'll be able to make friends and attract lovers anywhere you go, anytime you want.

*************************************************
HERE'S A SMALL SAMPLE OF WHAT YOU'LL LEARN:
*************************************************


  • How to create situations where people will throw themselves at you, without you having to approach them or face rejection.
  • The simple steps to create a special event that will feed you hot dates and make you the “popular and in demand” person everyone wants a piece of.
  • The simple secrets of becoming approachable so member of the opposite sex want to talk to you.

  • How to develop an almost Celebrity-Like Reputation for yourself so you get approached and asked out on dates.
  • A simple system that compels members of the opposite sex to approach you and strike up conversations so you never have to worry about rejection again.

  • And much more!

    *************************************************
    HOW TO GET INVOLVED
    *************************************************

    The meeting is limited to 35 people due to the size limitations of the classroom (we'll be moving around a lot). Our meetings usually sell out quickly, so here's what I recommend.

    #1 - Check your calendar right now, and see if you have Sunday, May 29th available. The meeting runs from 3:30pm to 5:30pm and is conveniently located in Harvard Square, less than 5 minutes walk from the red line.

    #2 - If you have that afternoon free, go ahead and RSVP for this workshop right now. Trust me, it's going to fill up fast. They always do.

    #3 - Write it in your calendar so you remember to attend, and please arrive at 3:15pm for registration and personal networking.

    The cost of the event is only $20, which is a bargain for a professional training that includes these skill-building drills + personality feedback. Please remember to bring:

    • $20 cash
    • A pen
    • A great attitude
    • And a willingness to learn fun, new things.

    I'm looking forward to seeing you there.

    Eric

    P.S. - Take down my cell number in case you have any questions about the event or if you get lost. The venue is extremely easy to find, so you should have no problems. My cell is: 617-903-7371.
item.how_to_find_us: Go in the front door. The signs will point you to the room. Its the big lecture room.
item.name: How To Get Them to Approach YOU
